abstract: The cuts, along with other streamlining efforts, would save the company $1.3 billion to $1.6 billion a year.
snippet: The cuts, along with other streamlining efforts, would save the company $1.3 billion to $1.6 billion a year.
lead_paragraph: With generic competition looming for two of its blockbuster drugs and use declining for its drug-coated stents, Johnson & Johnson said yesterday that it would eliminate up to 4,800 jobs.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Plans to Cut 4,800 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Plans to Cut 4,800 Jobs
